short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to change the color of background and rotate background.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By using this extension, you can easily change background color and rotate screen to 360 degree. You can select any color according to your choice. And use rotate screen feature to have fun with your friends.

Any issues, feature requests, bugs reach out to the developer.

https://allsapk.com/
